input: Please execute a batch request to fetch change requests with reason code 1 and those that are pending.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests?$filter=ReasonCode eq '1' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusName eq 'Pending' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
